originalText.text: This studio is the best in the business. Over 2 sessions, Logan completely reworked my half sleeve and it looks amazing! He takes the time to make you feel comfortable and no project is too tough. Logan you are the man! Thank you so much! Shout out to the front of the shop, thank you guys for the awesome communication with booking. Most professional shop I’ve ever worked with.

text.text: This studio is the best in the business. Over 2 sessions, Logan completely reworked my half sleeve and it looks amazing! He takes the time to make you feel comfortable and no project is too tough. Logan you are the man! Thank you so much! Shout out to the front of the shop, thank you guys for the awesome communication with booking. Most professional shop I’ve ever worked with.

originalText.text: I can not praise Logan enough for the work he has done for my cover-up. The art is amazing and the atmosphere in the shop is next level. Truly an amazing experience. I'm getting a great tattoo and watching Jasmin and chelsea drawing other pieces. Everyone in the shop is highly talented artist and fun to be around. So many laughs, can't wait to go back and get more done.

text.text: I can not praise Logan enough for the work he has done for my cover-up. The art is amazing and the atmosphere in the shop is next level. Truly an amazing experience. I'm getting a great tattoo and watching Jasmin and chelsea drawing other pieces. Everyone in the shop is highly talented artist and fun to be around. So many laughs, can't wait to go back and get more done.

originalText.text:
10/10 recommend this studio!   As an out of towner, I was hesitant on driving to the city.   The shop provided me info of a parking app to use and the garage was only 0.2 miles from the shop, the neighborhood was nice, I felt safe as a woman walking by myself.

I arrived and walked in and was immediately greeted by Jasmine and felt welcomed.   I've been to several studios where I've felt intimidated,  or uncomfortable,  the Hidden Rose was not the case.  Every artist and employee there was approachable,  welcoming,  and pleasant!

The studio itself is small, but not being from NYC I'd assume this size is normal.   The studio is clean, well decorated,  flowing,  and bright.  There is hardly any noise from equipment,  no TVs, and low volume music being played.

It was most enjoyable hearing conversations between artists,  clients,  and visitors.  Listening to Logan bestow his knowledge upon other artists was heartwarming,  knowing that his skills and craft is being passed down.

My review today is based on the studio itself as I had work preformed by a guest artist, Isaac Aguila.  However, I've followed Logan and Steve on IG for a while, and have seen their work at several conventions and would highly recommend them both to someone looking for an artist.

It was most enjoyable hearing conversations between artists,  clients,  and visitors.  Listening to Logan bestow his knowledge upon other artists was heartwarming,  knowing that his skills and craft is being passed down.

originalText.text: I've been a client of Logan's for a long time and was excited to visit him in his new space for a cover up tattoo. He's an amazing artist, that's well known, and his space is a great representation of who he is. The attention to detail in the layout and decor make for a comfortable, clean and inspiring space to get tattooed. Check it out!

text.text: I've been a client of Logan's for a long time and was excited to visit him in his new space for a cover up tattoo. He's an amazing artist, that's well known, and his space is a great representation of who he is. The attention to detail in the layout and decor make for a comfortable, clean and inspiring space to get tattooed. Check it out!

originalText.text:
This shop is very special. All of the artist are exceptionally talented but have a striking humility you don’t find in other shops with skills of this level in NYC. The vibe in the shop is energetic and welcoming, but when the artists are focused they are brilliantly intense. Above all is Stephen Franciosa, who has been doing my pieces for more than a year. He has an unrivaled ability to not only create art but also make it come to life — almost multidimensional — in a way I’ve never seen. He also cares so much that the work is something you not only like but fall in love with. My words can’t do his portfolio justice so check it out. I have a list of pieces he is going to do  and I can’t wait. The Hidden Rose is simply the best you’ll find in NY.

Updated 9/30: Two more pieces by Steve done at New York Tattoo Convention.
